website_summaries.verdict: With padding and mesh in all the right places, this harness and vest combo is designed for  finicky feline comfort .
pros: Vest and leash combo with comfortable, adjustable neck and chest straps
Uses hook-and-loop closure instead of plastic buckles for durable, comfortable wear
Made with combination of padding and mesh to strike the balance between softness and breathability
Comes in a variety of colors and sizes
cons: Despite the name, some cats have managed to escape from the harness

customer_reviews.title: The best cat harness by far!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered multiple cat harnesses not knowing what would actually fit. This was by far the best one. The fit is perfect for a cat and allows good head movement. My cat Pumpkin, will actually run in it and is so happy when we go out that he hops like a deer (20-30 seconds into the video). I have trouble keeping up!
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and works as it should. It’s just ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and works as it should. It’s just my cat that’s broken and stops functioning when I put it on her. 😒😂
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Best cat vests ever and I have tried many
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased other cat vests that did not work well. The cats would just slip right out. Well these are awesome. Not only that but my cats are skittish and hate the vests and freak out when you put them on. NOT these! It is like they fell safe with how it fits. They actually just sit and let me put it on without clawing me anymore. LOVE them
customer_reviews.author: keri Banister

customer_reviews.title: very easy to put on my cat
customer_reviews.text: very easy to put on my cat. she is 71/2 months. it runs very small. She is 9 lbs. I'm going to order the large. The seller is easy to respond and price is great.. and my 2 cats use the toilet and walk on a leash. How great is that.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great walking harness!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this walking harness look absolutely adorable but it also is escape proof. My kitty is not able to wiggle her way out of this, the velcro straps are super duty and stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Secure and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Love this harness. It's easy to put on and is secure. My cat enjoy's her sylish walks.
customer_reviews.author: T Max

customer_reviews.title: Not pregnant, just fat.
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning mine as it is too small, but that was a mistake on my part. I’m sure it’s true to size, but I have a very big cat. I didn’t measure, as she’s a jerk, but I assumed the largest size would fit her. The Velcro however is very sturdy, so I doubt a cat could pull at it and have it come apart. My cat is FIV+ and I thought this would be a great idea to get her outside safely. If they had a bigger size, I would definitely purchase that.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Secure, cute
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this harness for a few months now. Use it to tie out our 10 lb. cat and to take him on trips in his carrier. Cat is very comfortable in it and has never taken it off. He looks super cute in it. We clip it to a 50 ft. tieout to give him outdoor time. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AP Wang

customer_reviews.title: for cats - keep the harness snug to avoid escapes
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the harness and it didn't take her long to get used to the leash...once I attached it to a longer run. The leash was representative of the advertised length so no complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: HCollom

customer_reviews.title: Cat escapes this
customer_reviews.text: It's cute. Well made. But, definitely NOT escape proof. Time after Time I put in on my cat, tighter and tighter each time. It doesn't take her more than 2 minutes to get it off. Less time with the leash on because she'll use the tension to help escape. Sigh, will return.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: great product the cat hates it
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, great product the cat hates it, but its a little F***er so who cares. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Strong velcro-escape proof so far!
customer_reviews.text: This harness was exactly what I needed for my cat! She was dying to get outside and I was worried she'd run off as we've only had her 8 months. She army crawled in the grass for the first few times, but eventually she got the hang of it! The velcro strap is very strong; she hasn't been able to escape (we tried a different harness that was just straps, which she escaped from every time). This was a great purchase. It came fast and is not flimsy material, which was a surprise due to the cost. It doesn't hurt that she looks adorable in it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Cooper loves/hates it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat despises this harness, despite how cute it is and how well it fits him. I think it's great, and he, being a cat, does not. I think it is wonderful and am very happy with my purchase. The pic is the least grouchy one I got of him, and it does seem well-made, especially considering the price. He is 9 lbs and I got a large. He will soon not hate it, as he gets used to it, and I am looking forward to taking him outside, if/when he will ever tolerate it. 10/10, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Toskami

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's truly escape proof, because my cat loves it. She purrs like mad when we put it on her because she knows she gets to go outside. She never got upset when we put it on her, even though I was expecting her to hate it. It fits nicely on her. She weighs about 8 pounds. It has plenty of room to fit a larger cat, but I don't think it would fit a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gatley

customer_reviews.title: MY FURRY ESCAPE ARTIST FAILED
customer_reviews.text: My cat, who managed to escape out of 2 Halloween costumes was unable to free herself from this harness. I cannot tell it will work because she is too focused on taking it off than getting used to it. She has rubbed up against everything in the house trying to wedge a loose the velcro like she did the costumes. I am impressed. I did take her outside in it with the leash and she rubbed up against the porch and the house trying to wedge the harness off. I brought her back into the house in case she may succeed. Hopefully she will get used to wearing it so she can go outside.
customer_reviews.author: MizzTea

customer_reviews.title: Can't give this harness a good rating.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this harness for about 3 months now. Penny (my cat) is comfortable in it but it does get warm for her in the summer months. I cannot endorse or give this harness a good rating. Penny has been able to escape this harness 4 times. She has figured out that if she turns toward me, then backs up she's able to slip out of it. The harness needs a crossover that will secure her front legs not just her neck. If you're looking for a secure harness this is NOT the one. It isn't escape proof. Thank goodness Penny just slips out then looks at me as if I owe her money.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Either my cat is a Ninja or THIS IS NOT REMOTELY ESCAPE PROOF.
customer_reviews.text: 3 times in a row now we've braved murder to get this vest as snugly on my cat as possible. within about 3 seconds my cat 1) glares at us 2) rolls to his back 3) hip-heists straight out of the vest 4) cleans himself to show his contempt for our insolence. If you have a docile creature who doesn't dream of defying you, I'm sure this works like any other harness. But if you're buying something branded as "escape proof", because, like me, your cat will do anything within his power to defy you, then please DO NOT BUY THIS THING. You will both waste your money and loose further respect from your cat.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C Stauber

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - NO RETURNS!
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned way to small. Measured the cat for the size and yet found the chest to be to small and the neck to fit perfectly. Would like to return but even though this was a prime item I am not able to. Extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: DenaJG

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for my 16 lb. cat
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the XL (>11 lbs.) for my 16-pound, 13yo cat who has never walked in a harness before. It fit perfectly! He didn't take to it quite as readily as our smallest cat did to his (I had to order three of these things in three different sizes for them!), but he didn't do the flop thing either. He ... tolerates it when he wants outside. I think the "hugging" nature of these harnesses maybe doesn't bother cats as much as other styles because I am two for two at getting them not to hate these. (The third cat has not expressed an interest in going outside yet and I haven't pushed it.)
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for going outside
customer_reviews.text: My kitten spazzed out while wearing this harness and still was unable to escape. It does take her a little bit to get use to it but once she does, she walks like she normally does. Because of this harness my kitten and I have been able to go on many adventures outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This sailor has earned his sealegs!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this company gives a disclaimer that they do not sponsor reviews, so rare on Amazon these days. The harness is perfect for my 13 week old foster kittens. They love to bumrush the porch door to get out, so we are working on leash training them to find their forever home and ensure their safety there. We got the 2-6lb harness and it fits well with lots of room to grow. The sailor style was the only harness left in stock at time of purchase and it does NOT dissapoint. These sailors will ear their sea legs yet!
customer_reviews.author: Emily W

customer_reviews.title: cat harness
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Sturdy, safe, easy to put on, cute. This harness met all my needs and exceeded expectations. Very well made and a statement piece to boot. 2 weeks in and not so great, 4 LV kitten darted for a lizard, canvas piece holding D ring ripped right off still attached to leash and kitten took off with vest still on. Not so safe. Reinforce D ring stitching. Number one in safety for this item, not up to par. Company replaced. Bungee leash missing on this order. I will re-Inforce stitching myself on this.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Try using treats and toys to help your cat get a feel for the harness
customer_reviews.text: I loved the different colors to pick from. It fits my cat (mainecoon) perfectly, that's what I was most worried about. She however didn't want anything to do with it of course (she's a bit nitpicky) she would wobble around a lot and then just plop down so I decided to introduce treats and playtime so that whenever she puts it on she'll associate it with good things. I walk around with a feather toy and she no longer wobbles. If anyone is having trouble getting their cat to walk in their harness I highly reccomend using treats and toys to help your cat get a feel for the harness.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Alianov

customer_reviews.title: Really is escape-proof!
customer_reviews.text: This harness works exactly as I hoped. I have a small ferral kitten I am trying to domesticate. I needed a harness small enough to keep the kitten from slipping out. The harness uses velcro to fit the harness to the small size of the kitten. I think he actually likes wearing it, as he's never fought me putting it on. Thank you for the great product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn K Fjeld

customer_reviews.title: My cat hates it.
customer_reviews.text: I got a harness for my cat from the Dollar Tree, it was very secure, I got this because I read the reviews and felt it would be more secure. It does not feel like it is more secure than the one from the dollar tree and my cat will not move with it on , which the opposite of the harness I got from the dollar tree. Products like this are hard to review, so I'm rating it on comfort for my cat and how I felt when I was putting it on my cat. She hates it and I felt that if she got scared she might get out of it.
customer_reviews.author: michael O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well for our kitten
customer_reviews.text: I bought the smallest size for our kitten, and it's just too bulky to be comfortable. Perhaps on an adult cat who has more room for the padding, it would be okay; but for the kitten, it severely hampers her movements because there's just too much bulk around her little shoulders. It's also very difficult to put on because it snaps under the belly instead of over the back, so she bites and scratches and fights while you're trying to fasten it. And then, once you get all that done, the exposed velcro sticks to the carpet when she falls over and makes her even madder because she can't get up. Not a very good design.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice item for an adventurous cat!
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 month old kitten is enjoying her harness and leash! The first couple of times she wore the harness, she wouldn't walk. She would only lay down and she seemed off balance. We kept trying it on her and she got used to having it on. She is an inside cat and we started taking her outside with the harness. The distractions of outside helped get her over the hurdle of having a harness on. After a week, she didn't even notice she had it on. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product =^..^=
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I followed the guidelines for measuring... and when they came they were perfect... I have two kittens and one was quite small and I was a little worried if it would fit her... it was like it was made especially for her... I didn't have to worry about them getting away... the velcro is extremely strong ...the harnesses are very comfortable or appear to be and my cats took right to them.. I have just ordered the next size up and my little girl will go into her brother's as he's going up a size.. just wish they'd continue to get bigger( the harnesses)
customer_reviews.author: Claudette

customer_reviews.title: Keep your cat from being a Houdini.
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of buying a harness for my cat that was really intended for dogs. I almost lost my cat on our first outing because he slid right out of it. That’s not happening with this harness. It comes up high enough and secures well enough that if he jerks on his leash, nothing happens. This product is well made, comes with a leash, and is reasonably priced. If you want to take your cat outside, this is the product for you! UPDATE: The harness trim is not durable. The harness itself IS. Originally I gave the harness five stars but the quality of the trim is so poor that I’ve reduced it to four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Surprising how quickly our cat took to this item.
customer_reviews.text: We have an older indoor cat who has always wanted to go outside. We were worried about her running off and maybe getting hit by a car, so we never allowed it. Saw this harness and leash on Amazon and decided to try it. The cat was immediately comfortable and thrilled with it. She now enjoys the outdoors and exploring the backyard. We do have to watch her because when she rolls around on the ground, sometimes the Velcro under the chest loosens a bit, but we promptly and easily readjust/tighten the Velcro again. Our cat is so much happier now.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda K

customer_reviews.title: Your cat had better like wearing it.  Or you will have wasted your money.
customer_reviews.text: This vest is great. Well-made, cute, functional and does as advertised. Strongly recommend you put it on your kitty about 30 minutes a day, then take it off so he/she gets used to the feel and restriction. Some cats won't abide it. My order of a Large unit seems to fit my 9lb young lady quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Satak

customer_reviews.title: So cute, he loves it but they do run small.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I’m a crazy cat-dad and this, and my big boy (18lbs) needed a new harness. They only had the sailor color in his size and I thought, lol why not that’s hilarious. But, this is so great. It’s just too cute. The baby talking was instantaneous, uncontrollable. There is no way to be manly and be around the cat while he is wearing this. TOO CUTE. Only drawback, it does run small. Like I said, he’s a big ole boy at 18lbs. He got an XL. He could use an XXL. Lol. It does fit, so I’m not sure if I will return it or exchange it yet but he doesn’t have much room for future growth.
customer_reviews.author: Homeboy Gotcha

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to get on!!
customer_reviews.text: IronKitty Cal was a little wobbly for about 5 minutes then chilled out & an hour later he LOVES his first harness! I got it so he could hang out on the balcony with me. After reading I expected it to take a week (@ least) to get used to being harnessed but hours later, he's good to go! May even take him on walks! Wish I'd gotten it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H

customer_reviews.title: I almost lost my cat.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this harness for traveling across country because we were moving. I hoped my cat could get out of the car and hotels for fresh air. I put the harness on many times at home and she seemed okay. Harness seemed comfortable for her and sturdy enough. Unfortunately, my cat got out of the harness in about two seconds. I managed to grab her just in time; otherwise she would have been gone. Losing her while traveling was my worst nightmare. This was traumatic. I gave the harness to a friend with a small dog. I'll never use this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Mares

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Nice and secure! The velcro straps are thicker than I was expecting, and they grip really well. The harness itself runs a bit small so you're better off ordering a little larger than you thought you might need. straight out of the packaging is a bit stiff, it will take some breaking in for the cat to truly be comfortable. But it does have enough flex and give that it does not impede movement even straight out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Well made and strong
customer_reviews.text: This is a great harness and leash. I was concerned that it would be too "quick release", but it holds very well for my kitty. I had asked a product question on Amazon and received an answer from someone who had purchased for her cat and she said she had even picked her cat up by the harness and it didn't release. I haven't tried to do that, but am very happy with this harness and leash for my cat.
customer_reviews.author: M. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Sizing not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product, but the sizing is all messed up. I used the sizing chart provided, measured my cat, and it was still messed up. I ordered a large because that's where her measurements fell. Apparently she needed a medium in the neck and large in the waist. So now I have to cut off a huge flap of velcro from the neck, but the waist is fine. Just a heads up. Still seems like a sturdy harness, that will be hard to escape from of she gets spooked while outside.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Domain

customer_reviews.title: My cats love them!
customer_reviews.text: They are so stylish and comfortable and sturdy! My cats love them and I love them! All my friends ask me where I got them! I used an XS for my 4 month old kitten (2.5 pounds) and an XL for my 2 year old boy (11 pounds).
customer_reviews.author: Karoline K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kittens
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 3 month old kitten like a dream thanks to its adjustable Velcro closure. Only issue I had was the lace across the back, which was easily removed. Although he hasn't tried too hard yet, I'm pretty confident he's not getting out of it if he gets spooked.
customer_reviews.author: J-Fizzle

customer_reviews.title: VERY WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to see my little family member finally take a walk in the backyard. He was so happy sniffing everything up (it was a priceless moment). This harness is well made and fits comfortably on my cat. He hasn't escaped from it, but from reading some of the reviews cats are natural Houdini's. I have one tip for this.... Always make sure your cat is in front of you, not behind. When the cat or dog are behind the harness, they can pull on their body and slip out backwards from the harness. This the best one I've found yet.
customer_reviews.author: Oso & Gata

customer_reviews.title: cat Approved
customer_reviews.text: My poor cat Lenny is a chunker. Diet food is helping, but needed to get him exercise. So a harness. It fits perfectly. Was pleasantly surprised .Secure and leash is good length though I keep it wrapped up short. Now how Lenny the cat did. He never has walked on a leash. I have 2 seniors who use collar and leashes well. Lenny did the dead fish flop the first two times in it. Then he belly crawled, and hopped. But 4th time out he acted like, Hey! Okay, this is alright! I think he looks smashing in that camo too.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E. Bollier

customer_reviews.title: Super cute *and* highly functional!
customer_reviews.text: The fit on some harnesses is difficult to get right...I don't know how many times I've brought one home and it didn't fit. The velcro closures on these adorable sailor suits make it very easy to adjust to the comfort of your cat. Riley goes out on the leash occasionally and I'm very happy that he hasn't managed to get out of it and run off! He's just too brave and curious for his own good. A note on the sizes: I often find it difficult to find a harness that will fit both cats, but in this case the subtle difference between sizes and adjustability made these harnesses the perfect solution for my babies 😻 #BreeandRiley
customer_reviews.author: S. Place

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried a lot of cat harnesses and this ones the best!!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the fourth cat harness I have bought for my kitty and it’s awesome. He is comfortable and can jump around and it’s very easy to put on. The Velcro is very strong and the harness didn’t get twisted up around his legs or anything if he tried to slip out or pull hard. Definitely the best fit for a cat you’re gonna find. And it’s cute ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Kay

customer_reviews.title: So I never worry about him getting squished by stupid drivers that are bizzy watch TV reading the news ...
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable fit is large to small. my Cat can not remove himself from it at all! So I never worry about him getting squished by stupid drivers that are bizzy watch TV reading the news paper and texting and all the while rubber necking at the people walking there pets at Powder Horn park in Minneapolis MN. yes we even walk our pet in 10 below weather. while we are wearing just T - shirts! Hey we are true Minnesotans!!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this harness. I have a 2.5lbs Yorkie and it’s hard to find things for him in the dog section but this harness for cats worked so putrefy. It is made of durable material like a military canvas, the tayloring seems secure, the velcro that goes around the body is fur/hair friendly and it’s not the kind that will get tangled in it. The fit is great and isn’t a hinderance for him to move. I like that the clasp for leash is attached to the harness too instead of it being just a hole so he doesn’t have to wear both.
customer_reviews.author: Fumie SP

customer_reviews.title: Our boy loves going on walks
customer_reviews.text: The first one we bought, the stitching broke the second my cat got spooked outside and pulled too hard, within a week or two of having it. I decided to give benefit of the doubt that maybe it was a stitching defect (it happens). They sent us a replacement immediately and so far has held up (been a lil over a month). We love the design and our baby boy goes on walks comfortably in it. Can adjust to their size. He's a decent sized cat (big boy) with no fluff and we got him a large. Fits perfect. If it holds up, then I'll be happy:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They run very small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2, size small for my 5 pound kittens, but they are too small. The velcro does make the sizing somewhat adjustable, but for my kittens, will only reach "end to end" of the velcro strips, making them not as securely closed. To my disappointment, they are ineligible for return. I would have exchanged for a medium, but since thats not an option, I'll just kiss that $25.00 goodbye.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice extra layer of security for transporting.
customer_reviews.text: Whisper is too adorable in this!!! I wanted it because there were multiple rescues lately who have escaped from vet lobby’s and while being transported in or out. I didn’t want to take that chance. I wouldn’t risk walking her in it in the coyote infested land in which we live. It is a nice added layer of security as well as her carrying bag though and especially for when taking her in and out of the bag in case someone opens the door.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: not only for cats
customer_reviews.text: This harness is perfect for my 3 and a half pound dog. It is cute and sturdy. It is easy to put on and keeps her secure all the time. Of course I didn't mention to her that it was for cats. I would recommend this harness.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Finally A Harness to Harness My Big Boy!
customer_reviews.text: Jasper is fat adjacent. Jasper is 17 pounds of (mostly muscle...ahem!) with a little bit of pudge because...snacks. I have never found a harness so easy to get him into (unsuspecting, of course) and out of in a jiffy. He hates all harnesses (even this one) and crouches in the corner or on the floor until I take it off. But one day, after putting it on him every day until he gets used to the feeling - he will trot around the neighborhood with this cool looking camo harness on and be the MAN!
customer_reviews.author: RubHerSoul

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on, stays put
customer_reviews.text: We tried quite a few harnesses that were either too hard to get on, or came off too easily. This one goes on really easily and adjusts well using the velcro straps - just be careful not to get your cat's fur stuck in the velcro. And it stays on despite how much they lunge and wriggle. I would say it runs larger than advertised, though - we got the L and it's a little loose on our two Bengals (9 and 10 lbs) but adjusts OK with the velcro wraps.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Sobelman

customer_reviews.title: Very good leash and harness
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it wouldn’t work but he stays put in the harness. My cat really liked it. He was ready to go out with or without it. I wanted to keep him safe. He didn’t want to go back in after I walked him around the garden for hours. He kept begging for more walkies after the first meowing meowing meowing. It’s tight but not too tight on him. He never escapes but I don’t think he was trying to in the first place. This works well. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: julian

customer_reviews.title: Great for very small animal!
customer_reviews.text: This in the smallest size fit our little 2lb kitten. He was terrified of kennels and this worked so well! Fit very well and we felt it would safely hold him.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great harness
customer_reviews.text: I like this harness design; it fits like a vest and doesn't have any of those thin straps that dig into my cat's limbs. The seller sent me an email with a few tips on how to ease my cat into wearing the harness, which was nice. It's been two weeks and so far my cat doesn't hate it. Patience is the key.
customer_reviews.author: windmillion

customer_reviews.title: Truly inescapable
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful about this product, but I'm so glad I bought it. My cat can escape any collar no matter how tight it is. Other harnesses were so easy to get out of it was like it was greased. She definitely tries to slide out of this one, but it's held up. She's a very small cat, only about 7 lbs, so I got her a small. It's a little tight around the belly, but it fits her neck perfectly. Highly recommend this for cats who can get out of anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At first she hated it, now she loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We had bought a different harness that our cat was able to get out of EVERY TIME! So we bought this one. At first she hated it and would just fall over when we put it on her. But we started giving her treats, playing with her while she was inside the house until she was used to it. Then we started going outsider with her. Now, she tries to crawl into it on her own because she wants to go outside and explore! So if you cat 'breaks' when you first try and use it, be patient, you can get them to wear it and be happy about it!
customer_reviews.author: Vince and Paula Scappini

customer_reviews.title: Finally, truly escape proof
customer_reviews.text: Our cat, Lucky, an orange domestic short hair, 12lbs. of terror wrapped in fur, has finally been defeated by an escape proof harness! After trying 3 previous styles of escape proof harnesses, of which he escaped from with minimum problems; we finally found a harness he cannot get out of! I recommend this harness to anyone who has ever had a "HOUDINI" cat like we did!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: My cat usually walks funny when we out clothes on her. We're gonna get her use to a harness and take her on walks soon! She's good at getting out of things, so the 1 star reviews concern me. I'll walk her around the house, then in the fenced in back yard, then other places just for a precaution.. I don't want her slipping out when on walks. Otherwise it's pretty and made out of good material. I completely forgot it came with a leash too, and it's a nicer leash than the one I already bought her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good walking jacket that I got for my cat for ...
customer_reviews.text: Good walking jacket that I got for my cat for a long trip moving from California to Washington. It worked well for this temporary purpose. The jacket fit snugly and seemed comfortable and he tolerated it, but he didn't like the restraint. Oh well. Still, if you need to "walk" your cat, this works, as well as a cat will allow!
customer_reviews.author: muushuu10

customer_reviews.title: Could be great for cats who don't mind shirts
customer_reviews.text: It is cute and the velco fastened tightly and fit my 11 pound cat but she will not walk when she is in it. It throws off her balance and she stumbles around (which is hilarious to watch, especially as she goes upstairs but that was not my intention obviously). If your cat doesn't mind being in clothes it would probably work great for you!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my big Tom cat!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off, cat can walk and roll around in it just fine. If you don’t put it on snuggly my guy can slip backwards out of it. The Velcro is strong enough so he can’t rip it off himself though. I like that they’re isn’t any bulky plastic clips that pinch or dig into my boy. I do wish there was a bright orange reflective color and a material that could be wiped clean more easily. Got a medium for my 14 pounder...still has a bit of room left in case he grows, also fits on my 8 pounder but is slightly roomy and would definitely promote escape. Overall, best harness I’ve come across.
customer_reviews.author: Lia Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my adventurous yet scardy cat!
customer_reviews.text: My cat will cry at the door until I put the harness on her for a quick adventure. This is the first harness that upon being spooked she has not gotten loose. She is about 9.5 lbs now, and was about 7 lbs when we started using this lst year. She really wants to go out to explore, but living on a main road there is alot of noise on our back porch so she often gets nervous if a trailer truck passes and goes to run back inside after a period of time. I am able to pick here up every time and get her back inside with no issues. She loves the harness!
customer_reviews.author: livewildly

customer_reviews.title: Slip proof!
customer_reviews.text: We traveled from Washington to Arizona, and I needed something my cat could not slip out of. She is small (8 lbs) and difficult to fit with a normal harness. I bought 3, including this one before we traveled to see which one would work the best. It secures with heavy duty velcro around the neck, and a huge band around the belly, so you can get a secure fit. This is the only one she could not slip out of, and I felt comfortable that she would not escape. The other 2 were returned.
customer_reviews.author: Wheels

customer_reviews.title: big precious approves.
customer_reviews.text: my cat isn't a big fan of being on a leash but what cat would be? Thats the price he's gotta pay if he wants to be outside tho. He's a long haired cat so its hard to get the velcro on tight. He hasn't tried to break out of it so I'm not sure how great it would be if your cat is crazy. It gives me peace of mind tho so I love it. And so does big precious:)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Denker

customer_reviews.title: Cat got out and nearly injured himself doing it
customer_reviews.text: I tentatively used this with my cat a few times and fastened it as securely as possible. It was good enough to withstand gentle tugs, but once he got spooked, he was immediately able to thrash his way out of the main body loop, leaving only the neck loop. He was in such a panic that he would have just choked himself if I didn't get it off him. The velcro quickly becomes useless when your cat's hair inevitably gets on it. NOT escape proof. Very disappointed and grateful that I didn't lose my cat to this product.
customer_reviews.author: katya

customer_reviews.title: Best casual harness for escape artists
customer_reviews.text: I tried lots of cat harnesses for my small cat who squirms out of everything. This is the only one that works. The one thing I don't like is probably the one thing keeping her in, which would be the high neck. She can't turn her head well while wearing it, which makes her loose her balance. I'll try breaking it in a little better to see if I can still keep it tight enough without sacrificing her movement.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but definitely not escape-proof.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the blue sailor one, and it is super adorable! I read a review on here saying to order a size up...big mistake - don't do that. It was far too big for my cat, but I was still able to tighten it down (with a lot of velcro showing). My cat flopped on the floor and was able to take her back feet and easily push the harness up and over her head. I know the harness was far too big, but, like I said, I tightened it down as much as I comfortably could. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rasmusson

customer_reviews.title: Great harness and seller!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats are 20lbs so I was hesitant to order this... but it fits perfectly and it’s escape proof!! I’ve actually ordered 2!!! I got the L the first time and the XL the second. Honestly, I think the L was a better fit because it closes perfectly while the XL has extra fabric/Velcro and they sometimes stick to the carpet. It’s not really a design flaw- just a sizing issue. When I purchased there weren’t many 20lb cat reviews soo I just thought I would share it. The seller has been very great. They left us instructions in the package and also contacted us afterwards to make sure we were happy. I am very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all 😡 does not fit my cat. Way too small and i ordered a large. And then get message not available for return. So i just wasted money and this is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crutcher

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my chi puppy
customer_reviews.text: This was the 3rd harness i got for my tiny puppy. First one was too big, second one had to go over her head and made her crazy. This one was just right. You can adjust it for a perfect fit and it doesn't go over her head so she is fine with it. Also, she looks adorable in it.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia wickner

customer_reviews.title: This is a great kitty harness My bengal who is 2 months old ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kitty harness My bengal who is 2 months old and was easily trained,Loves to go for walks The harness fits snuggly and is very secure Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and adjustable, keeps kitties safe on walks
customer_reviews.text: The harness is adorable! I am especially impressed that the Velcro straps are strong, and adjust to my cats well so it fits snug. I have two cats, and initially purchased one harness...then decided to get another. One cat loves the harness, sits still while I get him geared up for outside time. The other hasn’t had as much experience being outside so she did try to escape the harness after being spooked by a passing car. Thankfully, these harnesses are actually escape proof, so she wasn’t able to wiggle free and run away in her panic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good harness for tripods!
customer_reviews.text: Don't mind all the background noise. This is my 3 legged kitty trying out his new harness. I was worried it wouldn't fit him because he's missing a leg but it does and he'd very secure. Bought an xl. He's about 15lbs or so. Very cute
customer_reviews.author: bethany

customer_reviews.title: Back paws unstick the velcro holding it in place. It's charming but it's in a drawer.
customer_reviews.text: Abigail Cat hates it--and she can get out of it. It ends up just around her neck; then she bolts. The review questionnaire asks about stretch. Why would we want a cat harness that stretches? It is easy to put on. Just be sure it is extremely tight around the middle. The velcro straps are under the belly so the harness is in the middle of the back. Abigail unsticks the velcro with her back paws. She can walk in it--until she removes it.
customer_reviews.author: SalemJ

customer_reviews.title: keeps the cat feeling safe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great harness. The oversize of the jacket acts as security, likened to a thunder coat for animals to keep them calm vs a nylon harness with just the straps. The velcro is wide and my cat is not getting out of this harness. I love the camo print, looks tough ! If you need to secure your cat while out of your home this will do the trick. Just don't tighten around the neck too tightly. Kitties need comfort because they are not used to being harnessed and leashed. Now getting them to comply going for a walk (not a drag) is all up too you.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opinionated Cat
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and the sturdiness of this cat harness which I purchased to take my cat outdoors to walk and explore. He once was frightened by a noise and took off. The harness held up well (escape proof)! Unfortunately, my cat has a different opinion about the harness. He mostly takes 3 steps and lies down for 10 minutes, then walks for 3 more steps, and lies down again. When I adjust the harness to be very loose fitting on him (it would roll over to the side when he walked) he is happier but still he didn't do much more in terms of walking. Guess he's just opinionated about wearing it!
customer_reviews.author: MsZoe

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: Follow the sizing guidelines. I have a young female. Her neck is about 7.5 inches and girth around 10.5 inches. We ordered a medium and it fits great. The velcro is strong and will stay secure unlike other harnesses I've tried. I was skeptical to order this and wasn't so sure on color options but it's honestly the best option I've found and I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kanouse

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A cat harness that fits well and is easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these XL harnesses for two cats, one is around 13 lbs the other is about 14 lbs. These harnesses fit well and are easy to put on. Our cats seem to enjoy wearing them or, at least, they don't hate them the way they hate other harnesses that we've tried. Due to the velcro used, they fit snugly; neither cat has escaped from their harness yet. That said, they haven't really tried to escape this harness because they seem to find them comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. It's beautiful and exactly as pictured. Very well-made, and it's easy to put on my cat. Dex is 14 lbs and is wearing a Large.
customer_reviews.author: Sly

customer_reviews.title: Cute and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 month old female kitten that is 9 pounds and it fits her well. It could also fit a slightly larger or smaller cat because it was about halfway across the velcro on my cat. This is the 3rd harness I’ve purchased for her and she likes this one best and is the most comfortable in it. There is no way for her to get out of it, and she tolerated it after about 3 days (5 minutes per day) of training her to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great cat harness....
customer_reviews.text: I had a small version of this for my 4 pound rescue chihuahua so decided to try this for my new 10 pound rescue cat - easy to put on and secure. It does not stretch though, so you do need to get the right size. Works great. Nice color and graphics on the grey camp.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Well-made & Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is 11 lbs (slim but muscular and very active Bengal cat) which is right in between the size L and XL according to the size chart. However I choose XL and it was little big for her. She could fit better in size Large I would think. My cat is so used to wear her harness so she doesn't even try to escape, but this harness is deep cut around front arms so it's hard to escape even if she tries. It's well-made harness and the camouflage design is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Y.F.S

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for my cat!
customer_reviews.text: Brad, my cat, runs to me when he hears me pull the Velcro apart. He knows he gets to go outside as long as he wears his "jacket." ONE thing you MUST be sure of is the Velcro pieces are secure around the neck and tummy. If they aren't together the cat can slip out and you end up holding an empty harness. I learned that the hard way! It is a great piece of clothing for Brad. He is a tuxedo cat, so it is quite stylish on him!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Runs large but very cute and great velcro!
customer_reviews.text: My female kitty loves her vest. She feels more secure in it. The only negative things I can say, are that the vest runs larger than size chart. If you have a larger kitty that is a real (strong) puller, this may not be the best for you. It is down nicely but if ya have a good sized cat that is an aggressive puller it could possibly tear ring out of vest that leash attaches to. Thankfully my little girl likes it and is not bad about pulling, unlike her brother lol.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Good For Shape Shifters
customer_reviews.text: Got a large but should have gone smaller for my 12 pound medium-length fur cat. She wriggled out cuz she’s a meowdini. If I secure it as tight as possible it works but she hates it and looks miserable although it isn’t tight, just snug. Most cats just hate this stuff. She looooves going outside so she tolerates it. The collar feature works better than the old standard style harness we had that she ALWAYS got out of.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Mamma Jamma

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Of course the cat doesn't care for it but she is a cat. I put this on her when I open the porch door for air. I attach a leash to it. She has simply learned that if she has the harness on her only option is to lie down in the Sun and not run away
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Harness!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best harness! I’ve tried many harnesses for my cat, and this one wins! It’s SO easy to put on because it’s just two velcro straps. My cat was a little hesitant at first, but now he loves it. He tries to go inside the drawer to get it when he wants to go outside. The clip on the back is great because even when he puts on the breaks, he can’t wiggle out of it. I also threw it in the washer (no dryer) and it cleaned well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: R8V10

customer_reviews.title: Kot is kaptin now
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a five-month old kitten. Either he likes it or just doesn't know its there, its that comfortable. Plus it hasn't slowed him down any. The metal loop on the back is great when you need to get your little stinker out of a tight space and don't have any room to scoop him up with your whole hand. And if he's -really- naughty, just hang him up on coathook for a few minutes to keep him out of trouble.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so pleased with this harness! My kitten is only 3 months old and many harnesses were just too large. This XS one fits great and was sooo much easier to put on than the last one we purchased. Plus, he looks super cute in it! This is only our second time wearing it but I was able to distract him to make him forget he had it on at least for a bit! It’s a great start. We haven’t tried it with the leash yet. I have a good feeling about this one.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for 6mo Old Kitten
customer_reviews.text: This product fits my six month old kitten well, being firmly in place without choking or impeding full range of motion. Great for introducing my indoor-kitty to the great outdoors. Looks adorable her too! Product seems well made and I've not had any issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: For more than just going outside
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my cat because I like to put her on a yard lead so she can be outside in the grass. Ever since I got her spayed she has become a tyrant... always meowing and chasing and biting and scratching. But putting this harness on her, shes become the sweet loving girl I adopted originally. I even took it off to test it... and she went crazy again so its back on. Now we just call it her wooby
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this harness
customer_reviews.text: This has been fantastic so far for my girl. Easy to put on. Velcro fastening means size is always adjusted when it is put on so her growth hasn’t been an issue so far (still a kitten at this point). She’s worn out from 8 weeks old to her current age of 4.5 months old. I’ve had to wash the lead in the top loading washer, no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 8 year old cat who just discovered the outdoors. He has been outside every day for an hour at a time exploring in this harness. While I don't think any harness is escape proof, this one is excellent! I feel very comfortable taking my cat out in this. He weighs around 11 pounds and I bought the extra large one. It fits perfectly. I did order a retractable leash to use instead of the one that came with it. I love it and reccomend it as a harness for a cat. It is sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Robin J. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Dats a nice lease
customer_reviews.text: I think i need a size bigger but my cat is way more comfortable in this than any other harness. She wouldn't even walk with others, i let her sit in this one for an hour a day to get comfortable with it before i took her out. We went to a park and walked around for a couple hours. There was one time she got spooked and managed to free her head from the strap but the velcro stayed latched. Good buy, lease is kinda short though.
customer_reviews.author: Swashbuckle

customer_reviews.title: Easy on, easy off.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an XL for my cats. I have 2 boys about 14lb each. Neck is around 8-9" and waist is about 18". Fits good. Velcro straps makes it fast to get on and off. Although, wasn't thinking about the noise Velcro makes when I unfastened it off of one of the cats and spooked him. Other cat didn't mind the sound. So far no escapes like the other harnesses.
customer_reviews.author: Kamila Robillard

customer_reviews.title: Good but room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to put on but NOT escape proof at all. My cat was almost able to slip it off in a matter of less than 2 minutes and i had it very tight. It is cute and functional. Size according to size chart fit perfectly. I don't like that it comes so high up on the back of the neck. It seemed to bother his range of motion a little as far as looking around and grooming. I let him wear for a while to try to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: randaboo

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: This harness is easy to put on. My cat doesn't really pull too much. Use the top leash hook near the head, not the middle of the back, if your cat tries to back out of it. The only thing I don't like about this is how close to the neck the front collar part comes. It would be better if it were lower on her chest like my other harness. But overall, I am happy with it and it's a well-made and functional harness. Kitty loves wearing it and goes outside about 10 minutes each day!
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Cute and snug
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty snug on my boy but that was probably my fault for underestimating his size. I got the Small and he is about 10lbs. On the plus size, he can't escape! He seems comfortable in it and looks adorable. I just wish the chest portion had a clip in addition to the velcro so my escape artist couldn't get out when he figures out how velcro works (which he will).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to put it on my cats! And it seems pretty safe so far, they haven’t been able to wiggle out of it like they did with the old harness. It seems like they feel slightly uncomfortable in it: dont run and jump too much. But thats for the best!
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great harness for your cat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic harness for your cat! The Velcro makes it easy to get it around your cat. Baxter, my little buddy, flopped about for a bit. Take it slow and let your kitty get used to it and you’ll be fine. Now he knows when it’s time to go outside! It’s secure and I haven’t had to worry about him getting loose. He tried to pull away to no avail. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: AwesomistReviews

product_meta.title: Escape Proof Cat Harness with Leash, Adjustable Cat Walking Jackets, Padded Cat Vest
feature_bullets: Both chest and neck strap are soft and adjustable with Magic Tape enclosure. Measure your pet chest girth and neck girth, choose the RIGHT size for your pet, please refer to the second photo for size chart.
Escape proof cat harness with durable and strong Magic Tape,NO more plastic buckles. Please NEVER leave your pet unattended outside.
Padded harness is more safe than traditional leash, it will also makes your cat feel comfortable.
Extra layer mesh underneath makes better ventilation.

No harness is inherently 100% escape-proof. Only collar which may present a choking hazard can make it. Your cat is not a dog, he/she need to get used to the harness if he/she never wear harnesses or garments. You need to learn how to control the leash. Watch video online on Amazon will help you.

specifications.Manufacturer: Fengze Happy Time Pet Supplies Factory
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
